thread.title: ASEAN confident of growth outlook despite trade tensions

title: ASEAN confident of growth outlook despite trade tensions
text:
ASEAN confident of growth outlook despite trade tensions 8:05pm IST - 01:37 
ASEAN ministers, meeting in Singapore, say they are confident of their economic growth outlook despite rising global trade tensions. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
ASEAN ministers, meeting in Singapore, say they are confident of their economic growth outlook despite rising global trade tensions. David Pollard reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qdhf3V
